cd /c/Users/jmflo/kernel-sim

cat > docs/diagrams/02_flujo_procesos.mmd << 'EOF'
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> NEW: new proceso
    NEW --> READY: Scheduler add
    
    READY --> RUNNING: dispatch()
    
    RUNNING --> READY: Quantum agotado
    RUNNING --> WAITING: I/O Request
    RUNNING --> TERMINATED: burst == 0
    
    WAITING --> READY: I/O Complete
    
    TERMINATED --> [*]
EOF

git add docs/diagrams/02_flujo_procesos.mmd
git commit -m "Fix diagram 02: remove notes (GitHub limitation)"
git push origin main
